name: Clipped
description:
Clipped, the duck that lost its wings! Is a challenging platformer that tests the skill of the most veteran platformer. Immerse yourself in the unique surroundings of this magical world. Reach the top and find the answer to all these questions...

Gameplay:

Get ready to challenge yourself in a true high-stakes platforming challenge, where even the tiniest mistake can be your biggest undoings.


Leap from platform to platform using your gun, propelling yourself in your desired direction.

The World:

This world may seem normal at first, just like home infact, but if you take a closer look you'll notice a lot of things that just do not make sense. Venture forward and discover items, secrets and new paths into defeating this cruel world once and for all!

Features:

  • Simple to learn, hard to master!
  • 360 aim, to hit your perfect angle!
  • Charge your gun, to get the perfect distance!
  • Explore the world for secrets and special items!
  • Different guns for different people!
  • Save your progress and continue after a small break!
  • Minimalist graphics, pixel art and simple geometry!
  • Playable with a controller
